title: Three Lunar Eclipses
notes: QUOTE: "The Prophet (ﷺ) said: 'The Hour will not be established until there appear ten signs: the smoke, the Dajjal, the beast, the sun rising from the west, the descent of Jesus son of Mary, the Gog and Magog, and three lunar eclipses: one in the east, one in the west, and one in the Arabian Peninsula.'" (Sahih Muslim 2941)

sources.verification: Hadith authenticity verified by Islamic scholars
sources.methodology: Hadith authentication using isnad (chain of narrators) analysis
sources.source: Imam Muslim, 9th century CE
